curated_news.title: 'Coolly, calmly and collectively forge a deal that is good for America, good for India,' says US Diplomat
curated_news.description: Atul Keshap, President of the US-India Business Council, addressed the US tariff imposition on India, highlighting the nervousness among American and Indian companies due to the uncertainty. He stressed the importance of a mutually beneficial deal to foster economic growth and achieve the $500 billion trade target.
